name: satisfactorily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 in a way that is good or good enough for a particular need or purpose: I'm sure these problems can be satisfactorily resolved. The work had been done satisfactorily. See
satisfactory
More examplesFewer examplesThe company was judged to be performing satisfactorily.The mystery was never satisfactorily explained.Only two of the essays had been completed satisfactorily.
